extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite  Level 3 or above and registration in any DEVS plan
Exclusion  No more than 3.0 units from DEVS321/3.0; DEVS392/3.0

basic.description: Seminars offered by regular and visiting faculty on development topics related to their research interests. Consult the departmental homepage for further details of specific course offerings each year.
basic.subject: DEVS
basic.title: Topics in Development Studies I
